name: Army of Tentacles: (Not) A Cthulhu Dating Sim: Black GOAT of the Woods Edition
description: Experience the non-groundbreaking, non-award winning VN/RPG, Army of Tentacles, in all its DLC glory! Comes with New Game+ Benefits, the most amazing Cthulhu Dating Sim in the universe, as well as Halloween, SDCC, the Sequel outfits, and the item packs!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1000M 1.80GHz Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1000M 1.80GHz Storage: 2 GB available space
